label: A4B_tP20_84_afjk_j-001
title: Cu$_{4}$Pd Structure
comments:
Above $476^{\circ}$C Cu$_{4}$Pd is completely disordered, with the atoms placed randomly on the sites of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cF4_225_a-001}{face-centered cubic ($A1$) structure}.  Below that temperature it takes on this ordered tetragonal structure. (Geisler, 1954). 
 The value of 0.25 for $z_{5}$ is not given in (Geisler, 1954), but we infer it from the description of the cell as a decoration of the face-centered cubic lattice.
